page.title: 17Barrington School
page.content: Barrington School-Summer Term 1985. On the 29th.April we went to our school camp at Charterhouse.We stayed in little huts & there was a big field to play in.We went for long walks and did lots of environmental studies.We went to the Hambridge Festival in May to give a Maypole dancing display.As well as taking part in the Sponsored walk I went with the skittleball team to Tatworth school for the rally-both during June.On the 22nd.of June we went to Wells to take part in a Country Dancing Festival with about 2000 children from other Somerset schools.It rained all day so we could not dance.Instead we sang in the cathedral.We joined with 3 other schools-Hinton St. George,Shepton Beauchamp & Hazelbury Plucknett for a Sports afternoon on the 3rd.July. Alison Chance aged 9 years.
